title: Price SLP real time from Axie Infinity

api_list.name: Get SLP Price in USD

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://price-slp-real-time-from-axie-infinity.p.rapidapi.com/slp"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "price-slp-real-time-from-axie-infinity.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
